properties.name: ish.error.handling.stacktrace
properties.description: Boolean option that controls whether stacktrace is included in log and HTTP response. Default is false.

properties.name: ish.jwt.secret
properties.description: Property that saves JWT secret. No default value.

properties.name: ish.jwt.expirationMs
properties.description: Expiration time for JWT in ms. Default is 86400000 (equal to 24 hours).
